title: M7: Smoothness of representations
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary as the text already allows students to choose a language pair. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: instructors should emphasize that, in general, predicting the output of the system after a change like this will be very difficult, but an output sentence relatively similar to the original one could be expected; this, however, will depend on things such as, for example, if the word closer to the new embedding is a synonym, if they belong to the same grammatical category, etc.
